property.name: allTopics
property.shortdesc: The topics in the specified index section.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Index.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Index (a Document).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Index within its containing object.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the Index; this is an alias to the Index's label property.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: importTopics
method.shortdesc: Imports a list of index topics.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The file from which to import the topics.

method.name: removeUnusedTopics
method.shortdesc: Removes all index topics that do not have any index entries.

method.name: capitalize
method.shortdesc: Makes the initial letter for the specified index topic or group of index topics upper case.

parameters.name: capitalizationOption
parameters.shortdesc: The entry or entries to capitalize. (Optional)

method.name: update
method.shortdesc: Updates the index preview pane. Note: Does not update the index.

parameters.name: on
parameters.shortdesc: The spread or page on which to place the story. Can accept: Page, Spread or MasterSpread. (Optional)

parameters.name: placePoint
parameters.shortdesc: The coordinates of the upper left corner of the story bounding box, in the format [x, y]. (Optional)

parameters.name: destinationLayer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to place the story. (Optional)

parameters.name: autoflowing
parameters.shortdesc: If true, allows the story to flow onto subsequent pages if the story does not fit on the specified page. If no subsequent pages exist in the document, creates the necessary pages. (Optional)

parameters.name: includeOverset
parameters.shortdesc: If true, includes topics in overset text in the story.  (Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Index.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
